definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Can you give me a lift to the next town? ;
sentences.chinese: 可以順道載我到下一個鎮嗎？

sentences.english: David about tzu chi Ming fishing, dropping in inquiry learning to protect.
sentences.chinese: 大偉約志明釣魚，順道詢問學護的表現。

sentences.english: He often comes over to my home.
You can stop by to visit your ex-boss and say hi to them or treat them coffee.
sentences.chinese: 可以順道拜訪舊上司，向他問好或請他喝杯咖啡。

sentences.english: Mark and I flew to Hong Kong and China in September.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫和我在九月時飛返香港，順道到四川一遊。

sentences.english: One day I dropped in on her and found her badly iii.
sentences.chinese: 一天我順道去看她，發現她病得很重。

sentences.english: I asked him to check the headlight and taillight as well.
sentences.chinese: Gatz幫忙，順道請他檢查車頭燈和車尾燈。
你需要順道共搭一部車嗎？

sentences.english: There is one special rule, called taking en- passant .
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個特別的規則，叫做走順道。

sentences.english: I just come by to say hello.
sentences.chinese: 我只是順道來打個招呼。

sentences.english: He often drops in to see me.
You may stop by our place on your way to Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在去上海的途中你可以順道來我們這兒。

sentences.english: Afternoon, received a detour to see my old Propaganda Minister Gong Xinhan couples.
sentences.chinese: 下午，接待了順道來看我的中宣部老部長龔心瀚夫婦。

sentences.english: At Jennifer's house, Billy drops by .
sentences.chinese: 比利順道去珍妮家拜訪。

sentences.english: He stopped by with his wife for about five minutes during the trip.
sentences.chinese: 他和妻子在旅遊時順道拜訪了我，大約五分鐘左右。

sentences.english: I'll drop by sometime next month.
sentences.chinese: 我下個月會找時間順道去拜訪。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
